scripts.dev: bun scripts/init-csp-hashes.ts && bun run cleanCache && (NODE_ENV=development bun scripts/data-updater.ts --quiet &) && NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=3072 --max-semi-space-size=64 --expose-gc' NODE_ENV=development next dev
scripts.dev:with-data: bun scripts/init-csp-hashes.ts && bun run populate-data && bun run cleanCache && NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=3072 --max-semi-space-size=64 --expose-gc' NODE_ENV=development next dev
scripts.dev:full: bun scripts/init-csp-hashes.ts && bun run populate-data && bun run cleanCache && NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=3072 --max-semi-space-size=64 --expose-gc' NODE_ENV=development next dev
scripts.dev:turbo: bun scripts/init-csp-hashes.ts && bun run cleanCache && NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=3072 --max-semi-space-size=64 --expose-gc' NODE_ENV=development next dev --turbo
scripts.dev:memory-debug: bun scripts/init-csp-hashes.ts && bun run cleanCache && NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=3072 --max-semi-space-size=64 --expose-gc --trace-gc' NODE_ENV=development next dev
scripts.build: bun scripts/init-csp-hashes.ts && bun run validate && NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=4096' next build && bun scripts/generate-csp-hashes.ts
scripts.build:only: bun scripts/init-csp-hashes.ts && NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=4096' next build && bun scripts/generate-csp-hashes.ts
scripts.build:full: bun scripts/init-csp-hashes.ts && bun run validate && NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=4096' next build && bun scripts/generate-csp-hashes.ts
scripts.docker:build: docker buildx build --platform=linux/amd64 --build-arg NODE_ENV=production --build-arg NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1 --load -t williamcallahan-web:latest .
scripts.docker:prefetch: docker run --platform=linux/amd64 -p 3010:3000 -e NODE_ENV=production -e CONTAINER=true williamcallahan-web:latest bun scripts/data-updater.ts --bookmarks --github --logos
scripts.docker:populate-data: docker run --platform=linux/amd64 -p 3010:3000 -e NODE_ENV=production -e CONTAINER=true williamcallahan-web:latest bun scripts/data-updater.ts --bookmarks --github --logos
scripts.check:file-size: bash -c 'err=0; for f in $(find . -type f \( -name "*.ts" -o -name "*.tsx" \) ! -name "*.d.ts" | grep -v "node_modules/" | grep -v ".next/"); do lines=$(wc -l < "$f"); if [ $lines -gt 500 ]; then echo "$f exceeds $lines lines"; err=1; fi; done; exit $err'
scripts.validate: bun run lint && bun run type-check && bun run biome:lint && bun scripts/analyze-circular-deps.ts
scripts.validate:with-size: bun run validate && bun run check:file-size
scripts.validate:full: bun run lint && bun run type-check && bun run biome:check
scripts.reset:bookmarks: bash -c '. ./.env; export NODE_ENV=production; export AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID="${AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID:-$S3_ACCESS_KEY_ID}"; export AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY="${AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY:-$S3_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY}"; export AWS_REGION="${AWS_REGION:-${S3_REGION:-us-east-1}}"; ENDPOINT_ARGS=""; if [ -n "$S3_SERVER_URL" ]; then ENDPOINT_ARGS="--endpoint-url $S3_SERVER_URL"; fi; aws $ENDPOINT_ARGS --no-cli-pager --output json s3 rm s3://$S3_BUCKET/json/bookmarks/ --recursive --exclude "*-dev*" --exclude "*-test*" --include "*"; bun scripts/data-updater.ts --bookmarks --force'
scripts.reset:bookmarks:dev: bash -c '. ./.env; export NODE_ENV=development; export AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID="${AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID:-$S3_ACCESS_KEY_ID}"; export AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY="${AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY:-$S3_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY}"; export AWS_REGION="${AWS_REGION:-${S3_REGION:-us-east-1}}"; ENDPOINT_ARGS=""; if [ -n "$S3_SERVER_URL" ]; then ENDPOINT_ARGS="--endpoint-url $S3_SERVER_URL"; fi; aws $ENDPOINT_ARGS --no-cli-pager --output json s3 rm s3://$S3_BUCKET/json/bookmarks/ --recursive --exclude "*" --include "*-dev*"; bun scripts/data-updater.ts --bookmarks --force'
